\ottaexp\ottinterrule
\ottactx\ottinterrule
\ottpexp\ottinterrule
\ottpvalue\ottafterlastrule
}}

% defnss
% defns wfc
%% defn wfc
\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\bullet  \vdash \, \ottkw{ok}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_empty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash \, \ottkw{ok}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{x}  \in  \Gamma }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash \, \ottkw{ok}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash \, \ottkw{ok}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{X}  \in  \Gamma }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X} \, \Diamond \, \ottnt{A}  \vdash \, \ottkw{ok}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_tvar}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnwfc}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash \, \ottkw{ok}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXtvar{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn Tin
\newcommand{\ottdruleTinXXOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X} \, \Diamond \, \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Tin\_1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTinXXTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma }%
}{
 \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X'} \, \Diamond \, \ottnt{A'} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Tin\_2}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnTin}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTinXXOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTinXXTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn Tina
\newcommand{\ottdruleTinaXXOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond_1 }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X}  \Diamond_1  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Tina\_1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTinaXXTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond_1 }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma }%
}{
 \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond_1 }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X'}  \Diamond_1  \ottnt{A'} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Tina\_2}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnTina}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond_1 }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTinaXXOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTinaXXTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn Tinb

}{

}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTinbXXTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
 \ottmv{X}  { \Diamond_2 }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X'}  \Diamond_2  \ottnt{A'} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleblXXbtm}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \rfloor   \bot   \lfloor }{%
{\ottdrulename{bl\_btm}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleblXXor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\ottpremise{ \rfloor  \ottnt{B}  \lfloor }%
}{
 \rfloor   \ottnt{A}  \vee  \ottnt{B}   \lfloor }{%

%% defn subtypingt
\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \,  \top }{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXbtm}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \bot  \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_btm}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\mathsf{Int} \, \textless: \, \mathsf{Int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXanda}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \,  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_anda}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXandb}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}%
}{
 \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_andb}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXandc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}%
}{
 \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_andc}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXora}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}%
}{
 \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vee  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_ora}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXorb}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \,  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vee  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_orb}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXorc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \,  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vee  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_orc}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsubtypingt}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{A} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{B}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXbtm{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXarrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXanda{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXandb{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXandc{}}

\end{ottdefnblock}}

\ottpremise{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \textless\textless: \, \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \textless\textless: \, \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{tss\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletssXXora}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A} \, \textless\textless: \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{A} \, \textless\textless: \,  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vee  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{tss\_ora}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletssXXorb}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
\ottnt{A} \, \textless\textless: \,  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vee  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%

% defns TSubtypingP
%% defn subtypingtp
\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXReflTvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{X}  { :\textgreater }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{X} \, \textless: \, \ottmv{X}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_ReflTvar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXTVara}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{X}  { \textless: }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma }%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{X} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_TVara}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXTVarb}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{X}  { :\textgreater }  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma }%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B} \, \textless: \, \ottmv{X}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_TVarb}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXforallkfs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{B} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{C}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \forall \ottmv{X}   \textless:   \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{B}   \ottsym{)} \, \textless: \, \ottsym{(}   \forall \ottmv{X}   \textless:   \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{C}   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_forallkfs}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletsXXforallkfsb}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{X} \, :\textgreater \, \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{B} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{C}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \forall \ottmv{X}   :\textgreater   \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{B}   \ottsym{)} \, \textless: \, \ottsym{(}   \forall \ottmv{X}   :\textgreater   \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{C}   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ts\_forallkfsb}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsubtypingtp}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{B}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXReflTvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXTVara{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXTVarb{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXforallkfs{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletsXXforallkfsb{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTSubtypingP}{
\ottdefnsubtypingtp{}}

% defns Typing
%% defn gtyping
\newcommand{\ottdruletXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \top_{e}  \, \Rightarrow \,  \top }{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A}  \in  \Gamma }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x} \, \Rightarrow \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{n} \, \Rightarrow \, \mathsf{Int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXabs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{e} \, \Leftarrow \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \lambda  \ottmv{x}  .\,  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \Rightarrow \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_abs}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \Rightarrow \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \Leftarrow \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \Rightarrow \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_app}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXsub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e} \, \Rightarrow \, \ottnt{B}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{B} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e} \, \Leftarrow \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_sub}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXanno}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e} \, \Leftarrow \, \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{)} \, \Rightarrow \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_anno}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletXXtypeof}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e} \, \Leftarrow \,  \ottnt{A}  \vee  \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \Leftarrow \, \ottnt{C}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \vdash  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \Leftarrow \, \ottnt{C}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A}  \star_{i}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   typeof \  \ottnt{e}  \ as \ \{x: \ottnt{A} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , x: \ottnt{B} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \}  \, \Leftarrow \, \ottnt{C}}{%
{\ottdrulename{t\_typeof}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefngtyping}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{e} \, \Diamond \, \ottnt{A}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXabs{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXsub{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXanno{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletXXtypeof{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTyping}{
\ottdefngtyping{}}

% defns Reduction
%% defn greduction
\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \lambda  \ottmv{x}  .\,  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{v}  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \mapsto  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_beta}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXappl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_appl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXappr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{v} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{v} \, \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_appr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXanno}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e'}}%
}{
\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_anno}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXannov}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{v}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{v}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_annov}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXtypeof}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e'}}%
}{
 typeof \  \ottnt{e}  \ as \ \{x: \ottnt{A} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , x: \ottnt{B} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \}   \longrightarrow   typeof \  \ottnt{e'}  \ as \ \{x: \ottnt{A} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , x: \ottnt{B} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \} }{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_typeof}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXtypeofvl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}   \ottsym{::}   \ottnt{A} }%
}{
 typeof \  \ottnt{v}  \ as \ \{x: \ottnt{A} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , x: \ottnt{B} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \}   \longrightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \mapsto  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_typeofvl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleredXXtypeofvr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}   \ottsym{::}   \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 typeof \  \ottnt{v}  \ as \ \{x: \ottnt{A} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , x: \ottnt{B} \rightarrow \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \}   \longrightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \mapsto  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{red\_typeofvr}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefngreduction}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{e'}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXappl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXappr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXanno{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXannov{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXtypeof{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXtypeofvl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleredXXtypeofvr{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsReduction}{
\ottdefngreduction{}}

% defns ADisjointness
%% defn disjointness
\newcommand{\ottdruleadXXbtmr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{A}  \star_{i}   \bot }{%
{\ottdrulename{ad\_btmr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleadXXbtml}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \bot   \star_{i}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ad\_btml}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleadXXintl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\mathsf{Int}  \star_{i}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ad\_intl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleadXXintr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}  \star_{i}  \mathsf{Int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ad\_intr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleadXXorl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A}  \star_{i}  \ottnt{C}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A}  \star_{i}  \ottnt{C}}%
}{
 \ottnt{A}  \vee  \ottnt{B}   \star_{i}  \ottnt{C}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ad\_orl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleadXXorr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A}  \star_{i}  \ottnt{C}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A}  \star_{i}  \ottnt{C}}%
}{
\ottnt{C}  \star_{i}   \ottnt{A}  \vee  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulename{ad\_orr}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefndisjointness}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{A}  \star_{i}  \ottnt{B}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleadXXbtmr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleadXXbtml{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleadXXintl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleadXXintr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleadXXorl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleadXXorr{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsADisjointness}{
\ottdefndisjointness{}}

% defns TReduction
%% defn treduction
\newcommand{\ottdruletredXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{v} \, :: \top}{%
{\ottdrulename{tred\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletredXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{n} \, :: Int}{%
{\ottdrulename{tred\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletredXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \textless: \, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \lambda  \ottmv{x}  .\,  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, :: {A1 \rightarrow A2}}{%
{\ottdrulename{tred\_beta}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletredXXorl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}   \ottsym{::}   \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\ottnt{v} \, :: {A \vee B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{tred\_orl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletredXXorr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}   \ottsym{::}   \ottnt{B} }%
}{
\ottnt{v} \, :: {A \vee B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{tred\_orr}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntreduction}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \Diamond$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletredXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletredXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletredXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletredXXorl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletredXXorr{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTReduction}{
\ottdefntreduction{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnswfc
\ottdefnsBBottomLike
\ottdefnsTSubtyping
\ottdefnsTSubsub
\ottdefnsTSubtypingP
\ottdefnsTyping
\ottdefnsReduction
\ottdefnsADisjointness
\ottdefnsTReduction
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
